message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation.
Alice, your cut last round was a bit greedy. Let's be fairer to each other. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value decreases with each round, and this back and forth isn't helping either of us. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution at this point.
